h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister
content: Go back and check the large building near the door you first came through, and you should be able to spot a glowing pot in the back of the room. Break it, and you'll reveal a new **Awaken Wine Worm** to add to your collection!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister'.
The content is as follows:
Go back and check the large building near the door you first came through, and you should be able to spot a glowing pot in the back of the room. Break it, and you'll reveal a new **Awaken Wine Worm** to add to your collection!
